io.oasp.module.service.common.api.client.discovery

Interface ServiceDiscoverer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceDiscovererImplConfig

    public interface ServiceDiscoverer
    This interface abstracts the aspect of the discovery of a Service. You may choose an exiting implementation or write your own to customize the discovery of your Services.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void discover(ServiceDiscoveryContext<?> context) 

    • Method Detail

      • discover

        void discover(ServiceDiscoveryContext<?> context)
        Parameters:
        context - the ServiceDiscoveryContext where to set the discovered configuration. At least the URL has to be discovered.
        It is possible to have multiple implementations of this interface as spring beans in your context. An implementation may decide that it is not responsible for the given service API (e.g. only responsible for REST services). In that case it can return without doing any modifications to the given ServiceDiscoveryContext. Until the URL has not been discovered further implementations of this interface will be invoked. If all implementations have been invoked without discovering the URL, discovery will fail with a runtime exception causing the ServiceClientFactory to fail.
